reviews.review:
Its a unique experience, liking being a survival movie, as either the survivor or killer/Monster. 
The hide & seek, hunt & Escape Asymetry PvP  gameplay experience is both refreshing as well as, well unique, Its not as scary as some other horror theme game, but its certainly not for the fade of heart.

The mayor complain is the visuals, which isn't the best around. But its not so poor that it becomes an issue. The character animation can be improve as well.
Too many bugs to play it properly
I like Juke Master and killer
Не рекомендую из-за ужасного подбора игроков. Играл маньяком 12 ранга - сурвы 1 ранга. За маньяка играть невозможно, много багов. Игра ужасная, хотя задумка у игры была неплохая.

After 2700 Hours in this game I still stand by the fact that you should not buy this game. Dead By Daylight is a complete mess of optimisation issues, bugs, glitches, exploits, cheaters etc.
The Devs are lazy and barely care about their own game. They ignore huge problems like the DDOS attacks on their streamers and other players. They consistently ignore community feedback and their so-called "Player Test Build" is nothing more than advertising for their newest money grab. 

The last 5 Killers or so have been uninspired and boring, with recycled abilities and boring gameplay loops. 

For a game with so much potential Dead By Daylight is a huge disappointment
Quite Fun to play but the updates are too slow.  The matching need to wait too long too. Hope that can match with players in other server to improve the matching speed.

Сидишь, чинишь генератор, вроде уже до-чинил, но тут в  тебя прилетает топор с другого конца карты, либо к тебе из неоткуда телепортируется маньяк. Бегаешь бегаешь, тебя ловят и вешают на крюк, пока твоя тима чинит генераторы и очищают тотемы.
10 аптечек из 10

Pretty well balanced, its had its moments over the years though so who knows how long that will last... Also extremely easy to upset people to the point of leaving the game in your face.

hi this is my first review ever please be kind :)

i rate this game a 4/5, mainly bc ive never ever seen horror done so well, even when some people are "toxic" ... ITS FUNNY when that happens and u can only really talk with them for like maybe 10 seconds at the end so it doesnt ruin it too much. anyways.

the idea of stalking and sacraficing/killing people is SO FUN and also being stalked by things s is also so fun too. perfect game. its beatutiful. i fing myself maining killer rn.

however my only complaint is that i wish it was more hot :( please let the killers be sexy.

thank you

this game fucking sucks other than that it's pretty good
com certeza o melhor jogo que ja joguei

I do not recommend this game if you are looking to purchase now. AT ALL. The devs doesn't know what they are doing but keep releasing battle passes, first of all, if you're playing with friends you may have to reset your game and even steam a couple times a day because there's a bug known for a while that the game thinks you are still in a match and doesn't let you join the lobby, you also have another bug where you will be disconnected from the game out of nowhere even with a 300Mb fiber connection and get banned, there are people on the forums complaining they received 48 hrs ban for that. And you can have the "smaller" kind of this bug, where you are on struggling and suddenly you die because there's was a glitch with the connection. With all that you still have the devs messing the whole game trying to balancing it because it's too easy to survivors at rank 1, but doing that the killers (who knows how to play) are extremely OP at the early game and you need 4-5 matches to win the same bloodpoint a killer can get on one. Overall, the game has potential, I will keep playing because I'm already deep on this hole with my friends, but my recommendation is for you to not purchase it right now. If you are reading this 6mo-1yr in the future maybe the game is way better now.

Fun game with mechanics that are easily learned but challenging to master with several killers. 

The dev team has kept up with their love for this game by adding many survivors and killers to the game. Arguably too many killers for the casual player, but it at least keeps the game fresh. 

Most of my friends have this game for a good reason. It's fun, easy to play and it can nip your horror fix in the bud.
Great game if you enjoy killing your friends or people

当然是因为刺激好玩啦

its is a very fun and enjoyable game. the main issue with the game a a few balance issues as the game is very survivor sided. another big issue is the toxic community but if you are willing to look past they it is a very fun experience.

soy smurf... y con todas las horas que tengo, este es el juego que mas jugue y no me aburri ni tan solo 1 segundo... lo recomiendo mil veces tanto si lo jugas con amigos o que lo juegues solo... me e encontrado a gente que han pasado a ser mis mejores amigos y por lo tanto siendo una comunidad toxica (no la mayoria de su comunidad es toxica...hay gente que es muy positiva) esta su lado bueno...

O jogo era bom quando funcionava.
